docs.snippet: Senator Harry Reid, the majority leader, cited the N.B.A.’s example in calling on Commissioner Roger Goodell to take action to change the name of Washington’s football team....
docs.lead_paragraph: Senator Harry Reid, the majority leader, cited the N.B.A.’s example in calling on Commissioner Roger Goodell to take action to change the name of Washington’s football team.
docs.abstract: Senator majority leader Harry Reid calls on NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell to change name of Washington Redskins, urging league to respond to charges that name is offensive; urges league to follow example set by NBA in punishing Los Angeles Clippers owner Donald Sterling for racist remarks.

headline.main: Senator Urges N.F.L. to Change Name of Redskins

docs.snippet: The police said Jameis Winston, Florida State’s Heisman-winning quarterback, ordered $32.72 of crab legs and crawfish from a Publix but left without paying. His baseball coach suspended him....
docs.lead_paragraph: The police said Jameis Winston, Florida State’s Heisman-winning quarterback, ordered $32.72 of crab legs and crawfish from a Publix but left without paying. His baseball coach suspended him.
docs.abstract: Florida State’s Heisman-winning quarterback Jameis Winston is cited for shoplifting seafood from a grocery store in Tallahassee, Fla; Winston, who is also a pitcher and outfielder, is suspended from the university's baseball team indefinitely.

headline.main: Florida State’s Jameis Winston Is Cited for Shoplifting Shellfish
headline.print_headline: Winston Is Cited for Stealing Shellfish

docs.snippet: The essential logic behind Pep Guardiola's football philosophy remains beautiful in its simplicity: When your team has the ball, the other side doesn't. Without the ball, opponents cannot score, they tire and drift out of position chasing after it...
docs.lead_paragraph: The essential logic behind Pep Guardiola's football philosophy remains beautiful in its simplicity: When your team has the ball, the other side doesn't. Without the ball, opponents cannot score, they tire and drift out of position chasing after it, and that opens gaps which your quick-thinking, passing and moving players should exploit.

headline.main: Column: Tiki-Taka Dead? Long Live Tiki-Taka!
headline.print_headline: Column: Tiki-Taka Dead? Long Live Tiki-Taka!
